text: Nocardioides halotolerans is a Gram-positive, strictly aerobic, halotolerant and motile bacterium from the genus of Nocardioides which has been isolated from farming field soil on the Bikeum Island in Korea. == References == == Further reading == * * ==External links== *Type strain of Nocardioides halotolerans at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase halotolerans Category:Bacteria described in 2009
title: Nocardioides halotolerans
